name: Punch Crush
description:
Punch Crush is a fun little game we made in 1 hour (Well, 54 min to be precise) for our internal 1 Hour Game Jam.

It's a 2 player  button smasher game where you must repeatedly press a key to beat your opponent.

We made all of the assets except the music (ofc).

Made by:

- Dick Abanto Lou (Programming)

- Leonardo Arnao (Pixel Art)

- Renato Mendoza (SFX)
